page.title: 15ROMFORD BUS GARAGE
page.content: A bus garage is situated in North Street,Romford.This garage employs 249 drivers on one man operated buses.The garage is over 12,000 metres square in area and holds 95 buses, The garage uses computers to keep track of buses on the road.In an average day 76 buses are used.Buses break down less than 2% of the time.Half the children at Marshalls Park School use the 103 bus.On average 30% of adults use London Transport.From the garage you can obtain weekly and monthly bus passes. A bus uses a gallon of diesel every 12 miles.Leaflets are published monthly so that travellers can check on the time of the buses.Romford bus garage in an average week uses 380 buses and only a few break down which is very good for such a large garage.
